Activity: Start the day by organizing the week's notes and action items. Check emails for any updates from the vendor or internal team members.
Prepare a weekly progress report summarizing the activities completed, challenges encountered, and next steps for the EHR collection and influenza trend analysis project.
Distribute the weekly progress report to @ITPM-1, @ClinLead-1, @HIS-1, @HIS-2, @EHRDev-1, @EHRDev-2, and @DA-1, @DA-2 for review and feedback.
Schedule a brief check-in meeting with @ITPM-1 to discuss the progress report, address any concerns, and plan for the upcoming week's activities.
Lunch time! Relax and catch up with colleagues.
Review the feedback received on the weekly progress report and incorporate any necessary changes or updates.
Begin planning for the next week's activities, focusing on the key priorities and milestones outlined in the project plan.
Research potential solutions for any outstanding challenges or limitations identified during the week. Explore alternative approaches and best practices.
Finalize the plan for the upcoming week and communicate it to the relevant team members. Wrap up the week and prepare for a relaxing weekend.
